app.name: Online Music Toolbox
app.description: Free, fast, and secure audio processing tools. Supports format conversion, audio trimming, sound effects, and more, making audio processing simple and efficient

converter.title: Format Conversion
converter.description: Support for mutual conversion between MP3, WAV, OGG, FLAC, AAC and other audio formats with high-quality lossless conversion

trimmer.title: Audio Trimming
trimmer.description: Visual waveform editing, precise audio segment cutting, support for real-time preview and export

effects.title: Sound Effects
effects.description: Professional effects such as reverb, echo, noise reduction, bass enhancement to improve audio quality

separator.title: Vocal Separation
separator.description: AI intelligent separation of vocals and accompaniment in audio, support for separate download of vocals or accompaniment tracks

volume.title: Volume Adjustment
volume.description: Precise audio volume adjustment with real-time waveform visualization, support for batch processing

merger.title: Audio Merger
merger.description: Merge multiple audio files, support for adjusting order, real-time preview of merge effects

video-separator.title: Video Separation
video-separator.description: Extract audio from video, support for multiple video formats, high-quality audio output

recorder.title: Recording Studio
recorder.description: High-quality recording function with real-time waveform display, support for pause, resume and download

footer.copyright: Â© 2025 AudioConvert. Free Online Music Toolbox
